short_summary: Contract for POST DRIVER, LIGHT and POST FENCE METAL
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
duration_in_months: How long the tender is open
full_summary:
### Post Driver, Light and Post Fence Metal Tender Announcement
#### Contract Details

* **Contract Title (English):** Post Driver, Light and Post Fence Metal
* **Contract Title (French):** Piquet métallique, clôture
* **Contract Reference Number:** PW-22-01006306
* **Contract Amendment Number:** 1
* **Contract Solicitation Number:** W848-238716/A
* **Publication Date:** September 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 14, 2022, at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** September 7, 2022

**Contract Requirements and Specifications**

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of the following items:

| Item | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Post Driver, Light | 19 | Each | 25 CFSD, Montreal |
| 2 | Post Driver, Light | 26 | Each | 7 CFSD, Edmonton |
| 3 | Post Fence, Metal | 10,000 | Each | 25 CFSD, Montreal |
| 4 | Post Fence, Metal | 5,000 | Each | 7 CFSD, Edmonton |
| 5 | Post Fence, Metal | 12,000 | Each | 25 CFSD, Montreal |
| 6 | Post Fence, Metal | 8,000 | Each | 7 CFSD, Edmonton |

Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must provide the brand name, model, and/or part number, as well as the NCAGE.

**Eligibility and Trade Agreements**

This tender is open to suppliers who hold the following certifications:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Submission and Procurement Details**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. To obtain additional information, bidders must contact:

* **Name:** Roland Awara
